description.value:
Prerequisite: Air Genasi, Earth Genasi, Fire Genasi

You are the embodiment of multiple elements blending together. You gain Resistance to Acid damage. You also know the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplAcidSplash]{Acid Splash} cantrip, and starting at 3rd level, you can cast the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreateOrDe]{Create or Destroy Water} spell with this bullet once per Long Rest. Once you cast Create or Destroy Water using this bullet, you can cast it again using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.

Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells when you cast them with this trait (choose when you select this species).

These spells do not require spell components when you cast them with this trait.

prerequisites: Air Genasi, Earth Genasi, or Fire Genasi
